pilot_initial_calls: {FACILITY} Clearance, {CALLSIGN}, at {LOCATION}, requesting IFR to {DESTINATION} with Information {ATIS_CODE}.
{FACILITY} Delivery, {CALLSIGN}, IFR to {DESTINATION}, ready to copy.
{FACILITY} Clearance, {CALLSIGN}, requesting IFR clearance to {DESTINATION} as filed.
{FACILITY} Delivery, {CALLSIGN}, at {GATE_NUMBER}, requesting IFR to {DESTINATION}.
{FACILITY} Clearance, {CALLSIGN}, IFR {DESTINATION}, ready for clearance.
atc_responses_instructions: {CALLSIGN}, {FACILITY} Clearance, cleared to {DESTINATION} as filed, maintain initial altitude, squawk {SQUAWK}.
{CALLSIGN}, {FACILITY} Clearance, standby for IFR release to {DESTINATION}, I have a flow time of {TIME}.
{CALLSIGN}, {FACILITY} Delivery, cleared to {DESTINATION} as filed, fly runway heading, maintain assigned altitude, squawk {SQUAWK}.
{CALLSIGN}, readback correct, contact Ground on {FREQUENCY} when ready for push or taxi.
{CALLSIGN}, IFR clearance to {DESTINATION} on request, monitor this frequency.

{FACILITY} Ground, {CALLSIGN}, requesting pushback and start.

{CALLSIGN}, push and start approved, tail {TAXIWAY}, report ready for taxi.
{CALLSIGN}, engine start is at your discretion, altimeter {ALTIMETER}.
{CALLSIGN}, start-up approved, expect Runway {RUNWAY} for departure.
{CALLSIGN}, Roger, report ready for taxi.

{FACILITY} Ground, {CALLSIGN}, ready to taxi for departure to {DESTINATION}.

{FACILITY} Ground, {CALLSIGN}, requesting taxi to the run-up area.

{CALLSIGN}, taxi to Runway {RUNWAY} via {TAXIWAY_ROUTING}, hold short of {TAXIWAY}.
{CALLSIGN}, follow traffic on {TAXIWAY}, taxi to Runway {RUNWAY}.
{CALLSIGN}, taxi to the run-up area via {TAXIWAY_ROUTING}, report when ready.
{CALLSIGN}, hold position for arriving traffic, then taxi to Runway {RUNWAY} via {TAXIWAY_ROUTING}.

{FACILITY} Tower, {CALLSIGN}, ready for takeoff for {DESTINATION}.

{CALLSIGN}, Runway {RUNWAY}, line up and wait.
{CALLSIGN}, behind departing traffic, line up and wait Runway {RUNWAY}.
{CALLSIGN}, IFR release at {TIME}, hold short Runway {RUNWAY}.
{CALLSIGN}, fly the published departure, Runway {RUNWAY} cleared for takeoff.

{CALLSIGN}, identified, resume own navigation, climb and maintain level instructed.
{CALLSIGN}, contact {FACILITY} on {FREQUENCY}, good day.
{CALLSIGN}, climb and maintain assigned altitude, fly heading {HEADING} for vectors.
{CALLSIGN}, radar contact, maintain assigned altitude until {WAYPOINT}.

{FACILITY} Control, {CALLSIGN}, checking in at current altitude.
{FACILITY} Center, {CALLSIGN}, requesting climb to avoid weather.

{CALLSIGN}, {FACILITY}, fly heading {HEADING}, vectors for traffic.
{CALLSIGN}, cleared direct {WAYPOINT}, resume own navigation.
{CALLSIGN}, climb and maintain altitude instructed.
{CALLSIGN}, descend and maintain altitude instructed, traffic at 12 o'clock.

{FACILITY} Ground, {CALLSIGN}, safely parked, shutting down.

{CALLSIGN}, Roger, on blocks at {TIME}, contact company on their frequency.
{CALLSIGN}, welcome to {FACILITY}, stay on frequency.
{CALLSIGN}, copy on blocks, see you on the next one, good day.
{CALLSIGN}, Roger, shutdown acknowledged, have a safe rest of your day.
